references.paper_title: Generative Modeling by Estimating Gradients of the Data Distribution
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of score-based generative modeling, which is the core technique used in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Score-Based Generative Modeling through Stochastic Differential Equations
references.reason: This paper extends the foundational work of Song et al. (2019) by introducing the use of stochastic differential equations, which the current paper builds upon.
This paper provides a practical and influential implementation of score-based generative modeling which serves as a basis for many subsequent works, including this one.

references.paper_title: Diffusion Posterior Sampling for General Noisy Inverse Problems
references.reason: This paper directly addresses the use of diffusion models for solving inverse problems, a key focus of the current paper.

references.paper_title: High-Resolution Image Synthesis with Latent Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper introduces latent diffusion models, which address the computational challenges of applying diffusion models to high-resolution images; the current paper addresses similar scalability challenges using a different approach.
